title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 50-1.10 - Authorized foreign and alien insurance companies
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 50-1.10 - Authorized foreign and alien insurance companies

State Regulations

No authorized foreign insurer or United States branch of an alien insurer shall deliver or issue for delivery within this State any separate account annuity contract unless the insurer shall comply substantially with the provisions of this Subpart that in the judgment of the superintendent are reasonably necessary to protect the interests of the people of this State. Notes

50-1.10

York State Register August 31, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 35, eff. 8/31/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
